source_sentence: “catūhi kho ahaṁ, gahapati, dhammehi samannāgataṁ purisapuggalaṁ paññāpemi sampannakusalaṁ paramakusalaṁ uttamapattippattaṁ samaṇaṁ ayojjaṁ.
translation: “Householder, when an individual has four qualities I describe them as an invincible ascetic—accomplished in the skillful, excelling in the skillful, attained to the highest attainment.
What four?

source_sentence: Idha, gahapati, na kāyena pāpakaṁ kammaṁ karoti, na pāpikaṁ vācaṁ bhāsati, na pāpakaṁ saṅkappaṁ saṅkappati, na pāpakaṁ ājīvaṁ ājīvati.
translation: It’s when they do no bad deeds with their body; speak no bad words; think no bad thoughts; and don’t earn a living by bad livelihood.

source_sentence: Imehi kho ahaṁ, gahapati, catūhi dhammehi samannāgataṁ purisapuggalaṁ paññāpemi sampannakusalaṁ paramakusalaṁ uttamapattippattaṁ samaṇaṁ ayojjaṁ”.
